actions.text: Amendment SA 1146 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 223.

Amendment SA 1146 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6518-6520, S6523-6524; text: CR S6519) To provide tax relief to American families with children to provide them with more money in their paychecks to make ends meet.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1146 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1116.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1146 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 223.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1146 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 223.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To provide tax relief to American families with children to provide them with more money in their paychecks to make ends meet.
